rows.label: qev092708_MSG0010
rows.name: Sorry you had to be party to that debacle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0020
rows.name: The boss likes taking it out on us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0030
rows.name:
He's always giving us crap.
We're his favorite punching bag.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0040
rows.name:
They say he was a first-rate pilot once upon a time.
That's certainly no longer true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0050
rows.name:
Hraesvelg here—we've been working on it
since Earth, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0060
rows.name:
You should've seen it.
You could barely swing a wrench in our old workshop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0070
rows.name:
We had a different chief engineer back then,
and there was another test pilot besides me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0080
rows.name:
We poured our sweat and tears into
making Hraesvelg a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0085
rows.name: That is, till Kelemen got appointed our new boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0090
rows.name:
To that guy, Skells are just products to be sold.
Stepping stones to his next promotion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0100
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_JNK0110
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev092708_SEL0120
rows.name: Ask what happened to the other members.

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0130
rows.name: ...They died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0140
rows.name: The other test pilot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0150
rows.name: We lost him in an accident during a prototype test run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0160
rows.name: Our former chief was held accountable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0165
rows.name:
They wouldn't stop hounding him, and...
he killed himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0170
rows.name:
Then Alicia stepped up.
She was appointed the new chief engineer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0180
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0190
rows.name: Hey, Leesh. You look tired.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0200
rows.name: ...It's fine. I can hold out a little longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0210
rows.name: You'll burn out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0220
rows.name:
Kelemen keeps lumping you with all these tasks.
You need to breathe sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0230
rows.name:
And you haven't had your mim serviced
for who knows how long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0240
rows.name: It's about time you took better care of yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0250
rows.name: Look, I gotta work on the next thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0260
rows.name: For you and Hraesvelg, I can keep going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_JNK0270
rows.name: Propose an Idea

rows.label: qev092708_SEL0280
rows.name: Suggest it's time to take a break.

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0290
rows.name:
See? Even the BLADEs are telling you to take it easy.
You need to rest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0300
rows.name: But...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0310
rows.name:
...No, you're right.
Thanks for making me see sense, Liesel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0320
rows.name: Hey, here's an idea. Why don't we head outside?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0330
rows.name:
I found the most spectacular view.
You're gonna love it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0340
rows.name: Well, if you're gonna twist my arm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0345
rows.name: Sure, go on. Lead the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0350
rows.name:
Want to join us as well?
Hate to leave you out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092708_MSG0360
rows.name:
Then let's move out.
Screw it—I'm bringing Hraesvelg.[ST:wait ]
